text: Table | Ablett classification of tetanus severity Grade 1 (mild) Mild trismus, general spasticity, no respiratory compromisc, no spasms, no dysphagia Grade 2 (moderate) Moderate trismus, rigidity, short spasms, mild dysphagia, moderate respiratory involvement, ventilatory frequency >30 Grade 3 (severe) Severe trismus, gencralized rigidity, prolonged spasms, severe dysphagia, apnocic spells, pulse >120, ventilatory frequency >40 Grade 4 (very severe) Grade 3 with scvere autonomic instability
